product_name: Pepper's Roxanne Polarized Sunglasses - Pink Tortoise Frame - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The world just looks better behind the glare-reducing polarized lenses of the Pepper's Roxanne Sunglasses, a fun pair of shades at a great price. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Pepper's Roxanne Polarized Sunglasses feature polarized brown-tint lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: The world just looks better behind the glare-reducing polarized lenses of the Pepper's Roxanne Sunglasses, a fun pair of shades at a great price.
